channel.title: Girlfriend
channel.description:
Ok so I have this girlfriend, and right now I'm kinda in a weird situation. I really like her, but I don't really love her if you know what I mean. We fool around a lot, but we don't have that much in common. She tells me she's really falling for me, and I feel bad that I don't feel the same way, but also she's kinda weird in that she can be really forward with other guys too.
There's been a few situations where she's come really close to cheating on me, but sometimes it's hard to tell with the situation. :^/
I feel like I can't really talk to her like I would be able to, you know best friends and more than friends kinda thing, and I don't really want to leave her at the same time because I don't want to be alone. At the same time I don't feel like I'm being true to her by staying with her when I'm pretty sure this won't be long lasting relationship.
Any advice?

item.title: Girlfriend
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
Tought situation there dude. I would say you should talk to her, your concerns about her behaviors with other guys and what are your feelings. If you’re so sure this won’t last long, you have nothing to lose. Was she a good friend before you dated her because if that’s right and you broke up, there’s a good chance your friendship might be over.
